article_title: Clinton's Narrow Iowa Win Keeps Sanders' Single-Payer Health Plan Alive

article_metadata.description: Hillary Clinton’s razor-thin win in Iowa's presidential caucuses keeps alive Bernie Sanders’ single-payer health plan idea, a key difference between the two candidates for the Democratic Party’s presidential nomination. Whether President Obama’s signature legislative achievement, the Affordable Care Act, should be tinkered with as Clinton is proposing or whether hundreds of [...]
article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen
